title: Alarm, Phone ring, Notification sounds - all not working
content:
Factory Reset
Boot in “Safe Mode”
Confirm all “Sounds” are in max setting - no sounds
Selecting new sounds - No Sounds
“Do Not Disturb” is “Off”

Broken since Android 11.0 update. Fixed for 3 days with “Factory Reset”, “Restore”. But has reverted back to not working again.
